drivers.name: foo2zjs-z2
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This driver will also work for the HP LaserJet Pro P1102, Pro P1566, Pro P1606dn, P2035, and other Zenographics-based printers.

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
This printer is supported by the foo2zjs free software printer driver.

The printer is faster than the LaserJet 1000 and has a USB and a wireless connection.

Consumables: Print cartridge (1600 prints), ~$68 (part no. CE285A)
